author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Synchronoss Common Stock To Be Suspended From Trading On Nasdaq
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Synchronoss Technologies Inc:
* SYNCHRONOSS COMMON STOCK TO BE SUSPENDED FROM TRADING ON NASDAQ
* SYNCHRONOSS TECHNOLOGIES - RECEIVED NOTIFICATION LETTER FROM NASDAQ HEARINGS PANEL ON MAY 11,INDICATING TRADING IN CO’S COMMON STOCK WILL BE SUSPENDED Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
